abstract: Atsuto Uchida (内田 篤人, Uchida Atsuto, born 27 March 1988) is a Japanese footballer, who plays for Bundesliga club Schalke 04 and the Japan national football team as a right back.
comment: Atsuto Uchida (内田 篤人, Uchida Atsuto, born 27 March 1988) is a Japanese footballer, who plays for Bundesliga club Schalke 04 and the Japan national football team as a right back.
